classitems.description: Initializes the eventhandlers for button clicks to navigate between gallery items and sets the auto rotate interval for the gallery.
classitems.name: initialize

classitems.description: Called when navigating to a new item in the gallery. Either by button clicks or by the interval.
classitems.name: rotateGallery

params.name: direction
params.description: The direction to rotate to, valid values are "left" and "right".

classitems.description: All the settings for this block.
classitems.name: settings

classitems.description: All the functions for this block.
classitems.name: functions

classitems.description: Initializes the eventhandlers for button clicks to navigate between nowplaying  items and sets the refresh button click handler.
classitems.name: initialize

classitems.description: Wrapper function to retrieve all nowplaying details.
classitems.name: nowPlaying

params.name: onload
params.description: Whether this function is called as part of initialization

classitems.description:
Called on completing AJAX request to retrieve nowplaying details for either Kodi or Subsonic.
Hides and shows certain DOM elements based on what's playing.
classitems.name: nowPlayingCallback

classitems.description: Sets the interval to retreive new nowplaying information automatically.
classitems.name: setInterval

classitems.description: Rotates the block to the next/prev player. Called by interval or pressing next/prev buttons.
classitems.name: rotate

params.name: direction
params.description: Which direction to rotate to. Valid values are "left" and "right".

classitems.description: Clones the .player.nothing-playing and uses it to set up a new player based on the supplied values.
classitems.name: createPlayer

params.name: values
params.description: The values to set for the new player.

classitems.description: The Subsonic object containing all the functions related to Subsonic nowplaying.
classitems.name: subsonic

classitems.description: Retrieves the nowplaying information from SubSonic. On complete calls functions.nowPlayingCallback().
classitems.name: subsonic.nowPlaying

classitems.description: Creates a salt, used to salt the login information with. Used by functions.subsonic.getURL.
classitems.name: subsonic.getSalt

classitems.description:
Creates a SubSonic style REST URL with username, password and salt.
Pass along an Array of arguments to append them to the URL.
classitems.name: subsonic.getURL

params.name: view
params.description: Which SubSonic view to retrieve.

params.name: arguments
params.description: The extra arguments to append to the REST URL. The key will be used as the queryparameter, the value as queryvalue.

classitems.description: The Kodi object containing all the functions related to Kodi nowplaying.
classitems.name: kodi

classitems.description: Retrieves the nowplaying information from Kodi. On complete calls functions.nowPlayingCallback().
classitems.name: kodi.nowPlaying

classitems.description: Finds .cpu-cores by index, than sets data for cpu cores, retrieved from PHPSysInfo.

params.description: The data retrieved from PHPSysInfo.

classitems.description: Finds .lan-stats by index, than sets data for network, retrieved from PHPSysInfo.

params.name: data
params.description: The data retrieved from PHPSysInfo.

classitems.description: Finds .ra, and .swap, than sets data retrieved from PHPSysInfo. If no swap data found in PHPSysInfo data, hide .swap.
classitems.name: setRAM

params.name: data
params.description: The data retrieved from PHPSysInfo.

classitems.description: Finds .harddisks li by index, than sets data retrieved from PHPSysInfo.
classitems.name: setDisks

params.name: data
params.description: The data retrieved from PHPSysInfo.

classitems.description: Finds span.packages and span.security, than sets data retrieved from PHPSysInfo if this data is set.
classitems.name: setDisks

params.name: data
params.description: The data retrieved from PHPSysInfo.

classitems.description:
Retrieves psstatus data from PHPSysInfo using AJAX.
Then clears all processess and dynamically create new nodes and appends them to the block.

classitems.description: Retrieves the torrent list from Transmission.

params.description: Whether this function is called during onload or not. Optional, defaults to false.

classitems.description: Given a torrentId, will toggle the state of the torrent to paused / started. Depending on the current state of the torrent.
classitems.name: startStopTorrents

params.name: torrentIds
params.description: The torrent ID to stop/start.

todo: Rewrite so an array of torrents can be passed along.

classitems.description: Given a torrentId, will remove a torrent and local data.

params.name: torrentIds
params.description: The torrent ID to remove.

todo: Rewrite so an array of torrents can be passed along.

classitems.description: HERE WE GO!

If browser implements text-overflow:ellipsis in CSS and tail is …/Unicode 8230/(), use it!
In this case we're doing the measurement above to determine if we need the tooltip.

Before we start removing characters one by one, let's try to be more intelligent about this:
If the original string is longer than targetWidth by at least 15% (for safety), then shorten it
to targetWidth + 15% (and re-measure for safety). If the resulting text still is too long (as expected),
use that for further shortening. Else use the original text. This saves a lot of time for text that is
much longer than the desired width.
Document onload, sets up setting view specific eventhandlers.

waves classes to a set of elements. Set drag to true if the ripple mouseover
or skimming effect should be applied to the elements.
